label: cascading_failure_01_dx_storage_capacity_021
content:
## 2026-01-22 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance

- /storage/metadata: REQUESTS req | p50: 80000 p95: 80000 p99: N/A | err: 0% (0 errors) | success: 100%
- /storage/maintenance: REQUESTS req | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: 0% (0 errors) | success: 100%

### Infrastructure
- stor-a-05: CPU 92% | Mem 88% | Disk Used 99% | Disk Busy 99% | Conns: N/A | Net: 10.7/9.2 Gbps
- stor-b-17: CPU 74% | Mem 78% | Disk Used 97% | Disk Busy 94% | Conns: N/A | Net: 7.9/7.1 Gbps
- stor-c-08: CPU 67% | Mem 74% | Disk Used 95% | Disk Busy 89% | Conns: N/A | Net: 6.8/6.1 Gbps
- meta-02: CPU 77% | Mem 94% | Disk Used 88% | Disk Busy 78% | Conns: N/A | Net: 4.2/3.6 Gbps

### Connection Pools
- pool-01: active 120 | idle 30 | waiting 5 | exhaustion 2 | max 150 | avg_wait 12ms
- pool-02: active 85 | idle 20 | waiting 3 | exhaustion 1 | max 100 | avg_wait 8ms
- pool-03: active 60 | idle 15 | waiting 2 | exhaustion 0 | max 80 | avg_wait 10ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 87.8% | Bandwidth: 4.2 Gbps | Origin requests: 1,200,000

### Alerts
- [HIGH] compaction pending on cluster: 122
- [WARNING] scrub errors on cluster: 41
- [CRITICAL] quota hard blocks on tenants: 5
- [WARNING] metadata backlog: 5,600
- [INFO] network drops: 29

### Deployments & Changes
- Initiated overnight compaction surge window and deep scrub targeting.
- Enabled stricter batching and deferred non-essential namespace scans.
- Enforced tenant cleanup commitments to address quota overages.
- Throttled rebalance bandwidth during peak write periods.

### Events
- High ingest (+226 TB) drove compaction pending to 122 and scrub errors to 41; initiated overnight compaction surge window and deep scrub targeting.
- Metadata cache hit fell to 87.8% with manifest backlog 5.6k; enabled stricter batching and deferred non-essential namespace scans.
- Quota hard blocks increased to 5; required top three tenants to execute 24-hour cleanup/archival plan before any quota relief.
- Rebalance continued to distribute hot partitions, but disk busy p95 hit 93.9%; throttled rebalance bandwidth during peak writes.

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: Samira Q. 11 pages. 19 tickets. Status: Degraded; combined ingest, compaction, and metadata pressure. Actions: surge windows, deferrals, throttling, and enforced tenant cleanup commitments.
